Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering the cost and effort put into creating this product, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity to experience its superior performance and quality. I trust that you will find immense value in it. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
